content.rendered:
Henrik Dock is a partner of Mannheimer Swartling and a member of the firm’s Mergers and Acquisitions practice group.

With a broad private M&A practice, Henrik advises on acquisitions and divestments, joint ventures, strategic partnerships and restructurings. Henrik has considerable experience in complex business carve-outs and has recently advised on a number of high-profile international transactions in this area.

He advises clients across multiple industries and his client base includes long-standing corporate clients and recurring private equity firms. He works regularly with transaction structuring and management incentive programmes and is an active member of the firm’s Private Equity industry group.

Henrik is actively engaged in teaching at the firm and regularly lectures university law students as part of the firm’s Training Programme, amongst other training commitments.
